The doctored picture of Enrile is part o: picture montage of images showing well-known Philippine politicians in wheelchairs.
The writing above the images translates: This is the life of a politician in the Philippines. When it’s election time, they RUN. When they have a case, they become CRIPPLED."
The original stock image of a man in a w: to which Enrile's face was added, was sourced from a photo tweeted by local news organization ABS-CBN in 2018.
